price: And among them are some who look at you, but can you guide the blind even though they have no sight[39]?
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَنظُرُ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ
footnotes: [39] “It is not the eyes that turn blind, but it is the hearts within the breasts that turn blind.” See 22:46.
